pkgmetadata.longdescription: Manage and Summarize Data from Oregon RFID ORMR and ORSR Antenna Readers // Automates and standardizes the import of raw data from Oregon RFID (radio-frequency identification) ORMR (Oregon RFID Multi-Reader) and ORSR (Oregon RFID Single Reader) antenna readers. Compiled data can then be combined within multi-reader arrays for further analysis, including summarizing tag and reader detections, determining tag direction, and calculating antenna efficiency.
